channel.title: Login problems *SOLVED*
channel.description:
I have downloaded and installed Moparscape, and I had to make a few changes to the .bat file so it would run on windows 7 X64 bit. Here is my current .bat file. [code]@echo off cd "C:\Program Files (x86)\MoparScape" title Running Bot "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./MoparScape.jar; Bot 0 ::param 0 for highmem, 1 for lowmem, another 0 to make the song not startup [/code]
Now, I run it as administrator, and it successfully downloads the cache I click "Start server" and then I login to a random username and password like it told me to do. And here is the error I get.
[IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/34i1yyq.jpg[/img]
So I tried using a different name, and got the same error.
Here is the console from the time that I opened moparscape to the time that I tried to login.
[code][06:20:08] Starting MoparScape 3.2 [06:20:08] Playing 0-hangar.mid [06:20:09] [06:20:09] News: Welcome to MoparScape 3.2, the pinnacle of RS2 [06:20:09] News: first generation client editing, with a built [06:20:09] News: in private server, music player capable of playing [06:20:09] News: both midis and mp3s, item/object/npc changer/viewer and [06:20:09] News: much much more. For updates, suggestions, or help [06:20:09] News: please visit the forums at www.moparisthebest.com/smf [06:20:09] News: and post in my thread. Y'all have fun. [06:20:09] News: [06:20:09] News: For online servers, look at the [06:20:09] News: server status list at moparisthebest.com [06:20:09] News: [06:20:09] News: -moparisthebest [06:20:09] Server : 127.0.0.1 [06:20:09] [06:20:09] [06:20:09] Loaded 0 random handlers [06:20:09] # Loading controllers Server: Starting HybridScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 [06:20:30] [06:20:30] Logging into (MaDMaN4LiFE, *****) [06:20:30] Your UID is: 81938916 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from genuine.microsoft.com:50708 Registering user madman4life with pass ***** Server: hybridscape Server (2): Exception! Server: ClientHandler: Client madman4life disconnected. [06:20:33] [06:20:33] Logging into (MaDMaN4LiFE, *****) [06:20:33] Your UID is: 81938916 Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from genuine.microsoft.com:50709 Did not save for madman4life Server: ClientHandler: Client madman4life disconnected.[/code]
Any help would be much appreciated. Thanks for reading!
PS: I am running Windows 7 Ultimate X64-bit.
[font=arial][size=36pt]This has been solved! Thanks for your help tyttty![/size][/font]

item.title: Login problems *SOLVED*
item.dc:creator: @MaDMaN4LiFE MaDMaN4LiFE
item.description:
@MaDMaN4LiFE wrote:

THANKS SO MUCH. To everyone else having this problem, if your using Windows 7 X64 bit, follow these steps to fix.

Reinstall…

After you’ve installed it right click runMoparScape.bat and click edit.

Replace everything you see with this.

@echo off cd "C:\Program Files (x86)\MoparScape" title Running Bot "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./MoparScape.jar; Bot 0 ::param 0 for highmem, 1 for lowmem, another 0 to make the song not startup

And now run as administrator. Happy Mopar…scape…ing… I guess…

Read full topic

item.title: Login problems *SOLVED*
item.dc:creator: @tyttty tyttty
item.description:
@tyttty wrote:

i had the same problem i fixed it bye deleting it and reinstalling it

Read full topic

I have downloaded and installed Moparscape, and I had to make a few changes to the .bat file so it would run on windows 7 X64 bit. Here is my current .bat file.
